external.description:
Alt: I was reviewing movies when this meme came out.

And younger me basically got tired of my job including hating on bad movies.  Because I kept meeting filmmakers and actors that were genuinely hurt.

So I took my tech knowledge gained by building film review sites and video apps and went and found a job at Microsoft.

Much better than a job at Oscorp ðŸ¤£
external.title: a man in a suit and tie smiles in front of a car

record.text:
Btw I used to be something of a hater myself.

Was a professional film critic for 12 years in early internet days.

Wrote the first critics score aggregator for Rotten Tomatoes when it was a but a tiny little site.

Put my name + Rotten Tomatoes into search, see old hating on movies.
